data.name: Running Shadow - Moon Avenger Suit
data.detailed_description:
- The Moon Avenger suit increases your maximum health by 100 points. This will allow you to stay alive even after encountering dangerous opponents or hard obstacles.
- Upon purchasing suit, you will receive 10,000 bonus coins!
